titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Kings County cemetery inscriptions 1992.016
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:14:28 +0000.

did.abstract: A bound volume containing handwritten inscriptions of headstones located in cemeteries in Kings County, N.Y. The cemeteries where the headstones were located are not specified in the volume, nor is the creator of the volume. In the back of the volume is an index organized alphabetically by surname.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1992.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Kings County cemetery inscriptions, 1992.016, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
